    • Uses of MessageEnvelopeInterceptor in xdi2.messaging.container.interceptor.impl

      Classes in xdi2.messaging.container.interceptor.impl that implement MessageEnvelopeInterceptor 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractMessageEnvelopeInterceptor 
      class  ExecuteCommandInterceptor
      This interceptor will execute a command line on an incoming message envelope, message, or operation.
      class  ManipulatingInterceptor
      This uses a list of manipulators that can manipulate an incoming message envelope or message.
      class  VariablesInterceptor
      This interceptor can replace XDI variables in a $add operation with automatically generated persistent addresses.
      class  WriteListenerInterceptor
      This interceptor listens to changes on a messaging container.

      This interceptor can add defer results to a messaging container and execution result.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SkipLinkContractsInterceptor
      This interceptor will skip the link contract interceptor, if a request comes from a whitelisted IP address.
